mainTitle: What about doing some cleaning in your address book?

analyse.title: Let’s analyze your contacts
analyse.content: How messy is your address book? Super-clean? Or with clones, empty or useless contacts everywhere? TouchUp will tell you all about it!

play.title: Improving while playing
play.content: You can resolve all your address book issues while having fun and playing TouchUp little games!

keep.title: Keep control
keep.content: TouchUp will never make an action without asking you to check it before! You decide what you want to keep or not.

be-afraid-of.title: Always keep your contacts safe
be-afraid-of.content: Because we know that your contacts are precious to you, you can restore your deleted contacts whenever you want!

forget.title: Never forget your contacts birthday
forget.content: We notify you for each birthday and you can write directly a message to the lucky one

say.title: Your contacts will be grateful
say.cta: I want to test this cool app

levels.title: The levels on TouchUp
levels.description: Each time you improve your notebook, you increase your level to get closer to the stars!

six-feet-under.title: Six feet under
six-feet-under.description:
Well, let's not lie: the level of this address book is low... Very low! But don't panic, with TouchUp it’s possible to raise fast in the light of day!

And you, what is your address book level?

under-the-sea.title: Under the Sea
under-the-sea.description:
For the moment the level of this address book is little under the water... But don’t panic, TouchUp can help you reach the surface!

And you, what is your address book level?

among-the-flowers.title: Among the flowers
among-the-flowers.description:
The level of this address book is not a disaster, far from there! There are some obstacles on the path but with a little bit of courage we should go very far...

And you, what is your address book level?

in-the-mountains.title: In the mountains
in-the-mountains.description:
Not too bad for a beginning! This address book seems pretty clean but we can always do better, no?

And you, what is your address book level?

to-heaven.title: To Heaven
to-heaven.description:
This address book is almost perfect. Few bits here and there and it will be at the top!

And you, what is your address book level?

to-infinity-and-beyond.title: To infinity and beyond
to-infinity-and-beyond.description:
This address book is at the top! Now with TouchUp, let’s make sure it stays that way ;)

And you, what is your address book level?

games.title: The games on TouchUp
games.description: The idea of this application is to allow you to clean your contact book as easily as if you were playing.

clone-wars.title: Clone wars
clone-wars.description: This game helps you to delete contacts that are totally identical. Let’s begin the clone war!

fusions.title: Fusions
fusions.description: These are contacts with the same phone number or the same e-mail. We merge them, show you the new version and you just need to validate it.

king-of-capitals.title: King of capitals
king-of-capitals.description: We can automatically add capital letters to your contact First Name and Last Name. Much more cleaner right?

empty-contacts.title: Empty contacts
empty-contacts.description: These contacts are empty… Are they really useful for you? Let’s delete them!

nameless.title: Nameless
nameless.description: These contacts don't have any family name... Difficult to know who is who :(

next.label: You want a piece of me?

you-want-a-piece-of-me.title: You want a piece of me?
you-want-a-piece-of-me.description: These contacts don't have a picture. We can help you to find some!

be-international.title: Be international
be-international.description: We automatically correct your local phone numbers in international format.

previous.label: You want a piece of me?

almost-perfect.title: Almost perfect
almost-perfect.description: There is just one information missing and this contact will be perfect… We help you to find which one.

who-we-are.title: Who are we?
who-we-are.intro: We are two friends passionate about their jobs, who launched this application to help other people manage their contacts!

audrey.name: Audrey Hacq
audrey.description: I have been an interface designer since 2010. When I'm not trying to improve people's daily life designing services and experiences, I write articles!

jerome.name: Jérôme Morissard
jerome.description: Jérôme, iOS engineer. I always wanted to be able to manage easily my address book but I have never found the perfect app to do that... I thus created it myself :)
